refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares transeg ia, idur, itype, ib [, idur2] [, itype] [, ic] ...
kres transeg ia, idur, itype, ib [, idur2] [, itype] [, ic] ...

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ib, ic, etc. -- value after idur seconds.
idur -- duration in seconds of first segment. A zero or negative value will cause all initialization to be skipped.
idur2,... idurx etc. -- duration in seconds of segment

itype, itype2, etc. -- if 0, a straight line is produced. If non-zero, then transeg creates the following curve, for n steps:
ibeg + (ivalue - ibeg) * (1 - exp( i*itype/(n-1) )) / (1 - exp(itype))

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: If itype > 0, there is a slowly rising (concave) or slowly decaying (convex) curve, while if itype < 0, the curve is fast rising (convex) or fast decaying (concave). See also GEN16.
